= Class *jplex.common.Config*  =

== Description ==
The common configuration object that is used in the Component class





== Methods ==
<table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">                                
<tr><td> *Signature* </td><td> *Return Type* </td><td> *Description* </td></tr>
<tr><td> `each(fCallback)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Iterate over the configuration<br />  - `fCallback <Function>` with a single argument: an object with two properties <em>key</em> and <em>value</em><br/></td></tr>
<tr><td> `get(sName)` </td><td> `Object` </td><td> Get the value of the conf. parameter<br />  - `sName <String>` parameter's name<br/></td></tr>
<tr><td> `set(sName, mValue)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Sets the value of the conf. parameter, if the parameter already exists it will be replaced<br />  - `sName <String>` parameter's name<br/> - `mValue <object>` new value<br/></td></tr>

</table>
